reviews.customers_say: Customers find the turtleneck shirt fits well under work jackets and appreciate its soft, non-see-through fabric. They describe it as comfortable, lightweight, and chic, with one customer noting it can be dressed up or down. The material thickness receives mixed feedback, with some saying it's not too thin or thick while others find it too thin. The color accuracy also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it nice wh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Soft and COMFY!
items.body: LOVE this turtleneck so much as it is very soft and comfy. Slim fit (although I sized down) and material is just right (not too thin or thick). Can be worn alone or as a liner under another top. Liked so much, especially great price, that I bought four more in different colors. Read more
items.author: LCAllende

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loving it
items.body: Love it, very comfortable, lightweight, it is soft, fit well under my sweater or jacket Read more
items.author: Lulu

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin, but I expected that. Overall it's comfy
items.body: This turtleneck is super comfortable and fits well/true to size. It's super stretchy and feels pretty well constructed. It's very thin, however. You can definitely see my tattoos through it and some parts of a (nude) bra, though it wasn't so bad that I wasn't uncomfortable wearing it out of the house, its just not ideal. I think that's pretty typical with this type of turtleneck though, as I had similar issues with other brands. I wish they would make a thicker option. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: This shirt fit wonderfully and material was great! Read more
items.author: Candace Howard

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly fitted turtleneck base layer
items.body: Amazing turtleneck! Finally one that is fitted to my small neck without being suffocating(i have a small neck and head.) Im 5'6, 110#, 36DD and have broad shoulders. Easy to put on and take off but i wouldnt dry this top in case it shrinks. I got the white in size small. It is completely see through in the white as well as being super thin, FYI, but wearing this as a base layer it works perfectly! The sleeves are long enough as well as the shirt length. Definitely ordering more colors. Read more
items.author: Mo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin material
items.body: I got this in the color orange and it was very thin and kind of see through. The material was soft though. Read more
items.author: Jackie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price works with everyone’s budget
items.body: Perfect. Great fit and great material. Read more
items.author: Danita Stokes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The softness
items.body: I have 5 in these 3 white. I love the Lilly white look, I have the brown and pink they are so soft. Love them Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, White, Blue, Ivory, Magenta, Purple Red, Black, Dusty Green, Mustard, Orange, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
